ygData.subject: Re: I love EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: One thing to keep on mind is there is more to the game than just level, level, level. It is called everQUEST ya know. :-) But honestly things are pretty
ygData.messageBody:
One thing to keep on mind is there is more to the
game than just level, level, level. It is called
everQUEST ya know. :-)<br><br>But honestly things are
pretty tough and can be boring until you get into your
mid to late 20s. At least it was for me.<br><br>I'm a
ranger 30th level on bristlebane and most of the quests
that can be done as a ranger can't even be started
until just now. :-) As a matter of fact I just
completed my first quest for the short sword of morin and
even then I had help from fellow guildmembers to
do.<br><br>I find it hard to do quests legit because you need
a group and most groups force you to roll for quest
items so if I get a group together to quest for
something I need I still may not end up with it even if we
complete it! Its a bummer sometimes! :-)<br><br>I wish
they would do more single character
quests.<br><br>Dinbien<br>30th Ranger<br>Bristlebane
